item.description:
Hello everyone,
It is time again for our monthy guided meditation class. The kind of meditation we teach and practice is designed to help you access the still and quiet place at your center, so you can touch into a deeper reality inside yourself. If this is appealing to you, whether you are a beginner wanting to learn or an experienced meditator wanting to know how to add a spiritual dimension to your meditation, I invite you to join us.
Blessings to you all,
Rev. Johanna

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Guided Meditation Class
